      • registerCommand

        public boolean registerCommand(CommandOwner owner,
                               CanaryCommand command)
        Registers a command. This is called from CommandManager upon registering a command. Typically you don't need to call this yourself, however if you need to add custom help content, then this is the right place for it.
        Parameters:
        owner -
        command -
        Returns:
